mapper.select: select * from ( select a.id,a.name,a.username,a.sex,case a.sex when "1" then "男" when "2" then "女" end sex_text,a.phone,a.email,a.qq,a.address, a.role_id, b.name role, a.department_id, c.`name` department, a.created_time,a.update_time from sys_user a left join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id left join sys_department c on a.department_id = c.id ) a where 1=1 and name like "%"#{name}"%" and sex=#{sex} and phone like "%"#{phone}"%" and email like "%"#{email}"%" and department like "%"#{department}"%" order by created_time

select * from ( select a.id, a.name, a.username, a.password, a.role_id, b.name role, a.department_id, c.name department from sys_user a left join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id left join sys_department c on a.department_id = c.id ) a where username = #{username}
